description: Trip to Mt.Cokley with great views of Arrowsmith. Possible link to Arrowsmith summit if climbing is acceptable.
directions:
Same as to get to Mt.Arrowsmith, follow the road up to the pass then hike into the saddle.
See also Mt-Cokely trail listing on trailpeak, and, use our search engine to find all trails close to Port Alberni (e.g. Mt. Arrowsmith).
title: Mount Cokley Via Saddle
